mapper.insert: insert into tb_weather_search_scope_info( user_id, user_name, start_date, end_date, create_date, create_user_name, update_date, update_user_name ) values( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, now(), #{user_name}, now(), #{user_name} );
mapper.select: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY no DESC) AS no, user_id, user_name, start_date, end_date, create_date from tb_weather_search_scope_info
